scripts.start: source ../.env && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID VERIFICATION_TOKEN=$VERIFICATION_TOKEN CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET MONGO_URL=$MONGO_URL node dist/index.js
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run build -- -w" "npm run serve"
scripts.serve: source ../.env && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID VERIFICATION_TOKEN=$VERIFICATION_TOKEN CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET MONGO_URL=$MONGO_URL nodemon dist/index.js
